actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-30.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 2479) to help maintain peace, security, and stability in the Western Pacific and to promote continued extensive, close, and friendly relations between the people of the United States and the people on Taiwan.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2479 (Peace, security, and stability in the Western Pacific).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 2479) to help maintain peace, security, and stability in the Western Pacific and to promote continued extensive, close, and friendly relations between the people of the United States and the people on Taiwan.
